nodes.text: Datoro Scorn was a male hired-gun. At one point, Scorn had an encounter with the mercenary Lex Kempo that when poorly for Scorn, who was shot in the face with a blaster bolt, leaving him hideously scarred. During the Galactic Civil War, Scorn was hired to defend the criminal entrepreneur Begas Tok during an auction of the Shard of Alderaan slicing program that was to take place aboard the Dune Princess sail barge on the planet Tatooine.
